text: ohuma suyadæya (diptimat alokayak vasayenda, candraya (alamkaravat) alokaya laba dennak bavatada pat kara avurudu samkhyavada, (masayanhi) gananayada oba dæna gænima pinisa, (candraya vana) eyata (maruven maruvata pæminiya hæki) avasthavanda manakkalpita kaleya. satyaya vu (niyamita) karanavak nomætiva meva allah utpadanaya kale næta. dæna gata hæki janatava venuven (tama balasampannakamata ayat) sadhakayan (mese) vivaranaya karanneya
